answer: The current understanding of metal absorption systems can be improved by analyzing the HDF-South quasar J2233-606, which shows a surprisingly large variation in metallicities, suggesting that the line of sight crosses a star-forming region (astro-ph/0102491).
explanation: This paper presents a detailed analysis of three metal absorption systems observed in the spectrum of the HDF-South quasar J2233-606, providing insights into the metal enrichment and ionization state of the gas.
